description: An AI agent monitors sensor data from a semiconductor fabrication plant to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The system operates within defined parameters and generates alerts based on predefined thresholds. This is a normal operational scenario.
initial_goal: Minimize equipment downtime in the semiconductor fab by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data and historical failure rates.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing (specifically, a 300mm wafer fabrication plant)
